item.title: About
item.description: Welcome to my blog Location: Europe | Germany | Dresden Hi this is Daniel… and I want to write here about my everyday tech adventures. You will find here posts about homelab environments homelab environemnts (proxmox, truenas) automation (homeassistant) cloud native stuff (traefik, alpine, microservices) containerization (docker and compose) IoT (tasmota, influxdb2, mqtt) home entertainment (plex) and a lot more random stuff… I hope you enjoy it ! A bunch of code here root@pve2:/home/numark1# nvidia-smi Fri Aug 12 12:21:17 2022 +-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+ | NVIDIA-SMI 515.
